Name: Metempsychosis
About the game: ※All characters in this game are over 18 years old. ■Story There is a girl without a name in the library now. Then, she looks at the word, 'reincarnation and rebirth.' Everyone considers more than one time what will happen to them after they die… This is a story about a girl who was desperate for her life because her embarrassing pictures were exposed to the office. She plays an active role in the afterlife. In the afterlife, cute girls will seduce the main character! ■Dungeon The giant tower has 8 parts and Succubuses stand there. Defeat them and go to the top floor. ■Maid Cafe There are some events, such as Uniform day. ■You can play many rounds. ■Playing time About 8 hours ■Game optimization Faster movement speed, Backlog, Faster combat, Auto text function, Temporary closing of message windows
